attributes.description: A War Hammer reserved for Covenant who have reached the rank of Templar.
attributes.parsed_description: A War Hammer reserved for Covenant who have reached the rank of Templar.

attributes.name: Covenant Templar War Hammer
attributes.description: A well-made war hammer for Covenant Templars.
attributes.parsed_description: A well-made war hammer for Covenant Templars.

attributes.name: Crack of Dawn
attributes.description: "Many people feel like sunrise brings good tidings. Not here."
attributes.parsed_description: "Many people feel like sunrise brings good tidings. Not here."

attributes.name: Crawler's Cleaver
attributes.description: "Crawling through the caverns beneath Aeternum is not for the faint of heart. Carry a big torch and a sharp edge to ward off whatever you might find."
attributes.parsed_description: "Crawling through the caverns beneath Aeternum is not for the faint of heart. Carry a big torch and a sharp edge to ward off whatever you might find."

attributes.name: Creeping Cold
attributes.description: "It sneaks up on you. Before you know it, you're shivering. Then you're dead."
attributes.parsed_description: "It sneaks up on you. Before you know it, you're shivering. Then you're dead."

attributes.name: Creeping Recurve
attributes.description: "Vines grasp out from the limbs, lusting for flesh."
attributes.parsed_description: "Vines grasp out from the limbs, lusting for flesh."

attributes.name: Crème De La Crème
attributes.description: Cuts anything like butter, swipes with this Rapier are smooth and creamy.
attributes.parsed_description: Cuts anything like butter, swipes with this Rapier are smooth and creamy.

attributes.name: Crestborne
attributes.description: "As the waves endure endlessly, so shall you endure on Aeternum."
attributes.parsed_description: "As the waves endure endlessly, so shall you endure on Aeternum."

attributes.name: Crimson Guard
attributes.description: "Conviction guards against weakness, as the dawn guards against the night."
attributes.parsed_description: "Conviction guards against weakness, as the dawn guards against the night."

attributes.name: Crimson King
attributes.description: "Royal blood flows like any other blood, fastest from a severed limb."
attributes.parsed_description: "Royal blood flows like any other blood, fastest from a severed limb."

attributes.name: Crimson Vow
attributes.description: "As you wrap your blade in this crimson cloth, give thanks for all It has given. The Power to conquer. The True Sight to believe. And the Will to march forth."
attributes.parsed_description: "As you wrap your blade in this crimson cloth, give thanks for all It has given. The Power to conquer. The True Sight to believe. And the Will to march forth."

attributes.name: Crow's Eye Bow
attributes.description: “The pirate king called himself the Crow's Eye. Over the decades he spent sailing the seas he amassed a small armada, and with that armada, a massive fortune.”
attributes.parsed_description: “The pirate king called himself the Crow's Eye. Over the decades he spent sailing the seas he amassed a small armada, and with that armada, a massive fortune.”

attributes.name: Crow's Nest
attributes.description: "The lookout was the first to set her eyes on the mythical island. After months battling the waves at sea, the crew would now turn their eyes towards a new foe."
attributes.parsed_description: "The lookout was the first to set her eyes on the mythical island. After months battling the waves at sea, the crew would now turn their eyes towards a new foe."

attributes.name: Cruel Delight
attributes.description: "While others enjoyed more pleasant hobbies, Abraxis took his love of torture to new depths."
attributes.parsed_description: "While others enjoyed more pleasant hobbies, Abraxis took his love of torture to new depths."

attributes.name: Cruel Musket
attributes.description: "Wield this musket well and act in good faith, for its last owner did not."
attributes.parsed_description: "Wield this musket well and act in good faith, for its last owner did not."

attributes.name: Crusher's Craze
attributes.description: "Like a toddler with a new toy, the man teetered on the brink of insanity, smashing all he could find with his hammer."
attributes.parsed_description: "Like a toddler with a new toy, the man teetered on the brink of insanity, smashing all he could find with his hammer."

attributes.name: Crushing Blow
attributes.description: "A single hit will reduce stone to rubble, and your enemies to past regrets."
attributes.parsed_description: "A single hit will reduce stone to rubble, and your enemies to past regrets."

attributes.name: Cryptbreaker
attributes.description: "With this in hammer, there was no crypt that could keep Goura locked inside."
attributes.parsed_description: "With this in hammer, there was no crypt that could keep Goura locked inside."

attributes.name: Cryptic Message
attributes.description: "Many people think a message that is to the point cannot be confused. Many people are wrong."
attributes.parsed_description: "Many people think a message that is to the point cannot be confused. Many people are wrong."

attributes.name: Crystal Carver
attributes.description: "Pickaxes are so old school. Just slash off a chunk of a rock with your axe!"
attributes.parsed_description: "Pickaxes are so old school. Just slash off a chunk of a rock with your axe!"

attributes.name: Crystalforged Waraxe
attributes.description: "The translucent crystals allow this weapon to reflect light beautifully."
attributes.parsed_description: "The translucent crystals allow this weapon to reflect light beautifully."

attributes.name: Crystal Infused Rifle
attributes.description: "Powered by enchanted crystals, each shot drains that power just a bit."
attributes.parsed_description: "Powered by enchanted crystals, each shot drains that power just a bit."

attributes.name: Crystallight Staff
attributes.description: "An unwavering glow shines forth from the staff."
attributes.parsed_description: "An unwavering glow shines forth from the staff."

attributes.name: Crystalline Bow
attributes.description: "While you are certain no vibrations emanate from this weapon, it seems to hum with power in your hands."
attributes.parsed_description: "While you are certain no vibrations emanate from this weapon, it seems to hum with power in your hands."

attributes.name: Crystalline Compound Bow
attributes.description: “Crystals protrude out from the limbs of the bow, adding a lethal and jagged edge.”
attributes.parsed_description: “Crystals protrude out from the limbs of the bow, adding a lethal and jagged edge.”

attributes.name: Crystalline Crusher
attributes.description: "Jagged crystals jut out from all sides of the hammer."
attributes.parsed_description: "Jagged crystals jut out from all sides of the hammer."

attributes.name: Crystalline Curse
attributes.description: "After she uttered the incantation, her lover turned to the clearest crystal anyone had seen."
attributes.parsed_description: "After she uttered the incantation, her lover turned to the clearest crystal anyone had seen."

attributes.name: Crystalline Fire Staff
attributes.description: "While you are certain no vibrations emanate from this weapon, it seems to hum with power in your hands."
attributes.parsed_description: "While you are certain no vibrations emanate from this weapon, it seems to hum with power in your hands."

attributes.name: Crystalline Flintlock
attributes.description: "Crystsals just out from the barrel, creating an unwieldy grip."
attributes.parsed_description: "Crystsals just out from the barrel, creating an unwieldy grip."
